= The framework of BBMS =
  # Message
  # BUS Manager
  # Notifiable entry

= Features =
  # Asynchronous event notification
  # Distributed application support
  # Allow separate business components to be combined into a reliable, flexible system.

= Workflow =
  # BUS Manager start up and wait for client to register themselves.
  # Client register to BUS to listener events(messages) it cares about.
  # When message comes, BUS schedule the dispatch thread to send the message to appropriate node of listeners.
  # Client unregister from BUS, and quit from the system.

= Developing a BBMS client =
  # Find the BUS Manager(Message Service Provider)
  # Register itself on the Manager
  # Can send and receive messages from the BUS then.
